siggar

~>, siggar, [%sggr p=$|(term [p=term q=twig]) q=twig] is a natural hoon that applies arbitrary hint p to q. q.

Definition

++  twig  
    [%sggr p=$|(term [p=term q=twig]) q=twig]   ::
  $%  [%sggr p=twig]
  ==

Regular form (tall)

p=%foo:

~>  %foo
q

p=[p=%foo q=bar]:

~>  %foo.bar
q

Regular form (wide)

~>(%foo q)
~>(%foo.bar q)

Compilation

++  mint
  ?-    gen
      [%sggr *]
    =+  hum=$(gen q.gen)
    :-  p.hum
    :+  %10
      ?-    p.gen
          @   p.gen
          ^   [p.p.gen q:$(gen q.p.gen, gol %noun)]
      ==
    q.hum
  ==

Notes

Rather obviously, all other hinting ~ runes reduce to ~>.
